comment: Jessica is super cool, she is clear on how she wants things. I took her in the summer for 4 weeks, this class is super easy I made an high B and never studied. Didn't really use the text. Power points provide all you need. TAKE HER SHE IS AWESOME!!
She is so nice and lenient on work. All the tests were online so it's hard not to get an A. Not a lot of busy work just a few assignments and papers. Take her.

This class is extremely easy! There is some busy work, but it isn't much. You never use the textbook, so don't bother. The tests were all online. I got over a 100 in the class, because there is plenty of easy extra credit. She has an accent, but she is easy to understand.

Take this professor! This class is a breeze! Easy A! She's very sweet! She is very lenient as far as grading. A lot of busy work so make sure you do those. Her accent is quite interesting to listen to.
